subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: After C. C. Sabathia wilted on opening day, Chien-Ming Wang looked even worse. Wang was hit hard and did not escape the fourth inning of a loss to the Baltimore Orioles.
snippet: After C. C. Sabathia wilted on opening day, Chien-Ming Wang looked even worse. Wang was hit hard and did not escape the fourth inning of a loss to the Baltimore Orioles.
